channel.title: Lottery Box help... [DELTA]

item.title: Lottery Box help... [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

I get no errors and it runs fine, but nothing happens when I click on the item.

public void givereward() { if(playerHasItem(6199)) { deleteItem(6199, 1); addItem(randomlottery(), 1); } else sM("You need 2 free slots."); } public static int randomlottery[] = {11694, 6585, 1050, 1048, 1046, 1044, 1042, 1040, 1038, 15000, 15001, 15002, 15003, 15004, 15005, 15006, 15006, 15008, 15009, 15010, 8002}; public static int randomlottery() { return randomlottery[(int) (Math.random() * randomlottery.length)]; }

if(itemID == 6199) { givereward(); }

Read full topic
